attributes.name: Legacy of the Magi
attributes.description: "You come from a long lineage of mages, do not dishonor what they have done."
attributes.parsed_description: "You come from a long lineage of mages, do not dishonor what they have done."

attributes.name: Leggings of Unknown Origin
attributes.description: "Found in one of the many Ancient Vaults, the origins of these leggings are unknown. They seem to not be of this world."
attributes.parsed_description: "Found in one of the many Ancient Vaults, the origins of these leggings are unknown. They seem to not be of this world."

attributes.name: Leggings of Untold Power
attributes.description: "Dig deep enough and unlimited power can be yours. For a price."
attributes.parsed_description: "Dig deep enough and unlimited power can be yours. For a price."

attributes.name: Legplates of Hate's End
attributes.description: "My hatred has but one end; your death."
attributes.parsed_description: "My hatred has but one end; your death."

attributes.name: Lifegiver's Gloves
attributes.description: "Give me guilded hands and I can give you the world"
attributes.parsed_description: "Give me guilded hands and I can give you the world"

attributes.name: Lightweight Vestments
attributes.description: "It almost feels as if you're wearing nothing at all."
attributes.parsed_description: "It almost feels as if you're wearing nothing at all."

attributes.name: Linen Duelist Gloves
attributes.description: Linen Duelist's clothing. Ultralight and maximally mobile, this clothing is designed for a fighter who wishes to avoid damage instead of absorb it.

attributes.name: Lion's Paw Helmet
attributes.description: "A long lost helm of an ancient batallion, the sheer ferocity of this armor is clear the moment you set eyes on it."
attributes.parsed_description: "A long lost helm of an ancient batallion, the sheer ferocity of this armor is clear the moment you set eyes on it."

attributes.name: Living Vines Boots
attributes.description: Feels like you're walking on air. Brittle decayed air that's been sealed in a tomb for 400 years.
attributes.parsed_description: Feels like you're walking on air. Brittle decayed air that's been sealed in a tomb for 400 years.

attributes.name: Living Vines Chestpiece
attributes.description: The vines are flexible yet provide greater protection than you might expect.
attributes.parsed_description: The vines are flexible yet provide greater protection than you might expect.

attributes.name: Living Vines Gloves
attributes.description: These gloves make a strange sound as you flex you fingers in them.
attributes.parsed_description: These gloves make a strange sound as you flex you fingers in them.

attributes.name: Living Vines Helm
attributes.description: Wood is surprisingly resiliant and makes for low-weight armor.
attributes.parsed_description: Wood is surprisingly resiliant and makes for low-weight armor.

attributes.name: Living Vines Pants
attributes.description: "If someone asks me one more time what the name of my other leg is, I'm going to burn this armor, even if it is really effective."
attributes.parsed_description: "If someone asks me one more time what the name of my other leg is, I'm going to burn this armor, even if it is really effective."
